message: Hi Bob! Since we both lose if we don't reach an agreement within 12 rounds, I'm proposing a 70-30 split. This is fair considering inflation affects you more than me with each round. If you counter with a better offer for yourself now, I'd have incentive to reject and counter later when your money is worth less to you.

Alice, I understand the impact of inflation. However, a 70/30 split is too generous to you. This offer is a much fairer split. Take it or leave it, you can make more money for yourself only if I accept it.
